#: Add issue & PR templates

Description
-----------
Create `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md`, `feature_request.md`, and `.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md` to standardize reporting and PRs.

Acceptance criteria
-------------------
- Templates for bug reports and feature requests exist and include reproduction steps, expected behavior, and environment.
- PR template includes checklist for tests, changelog, and contributor acknowledgements.

Labels: `good first issue`, `docs`
